sentence.Network_en: It seemed a singularly ill-judged enterprise for Truman to undertake.
sentence.Network_cn: 这对于杜鲁门来说似乎是一项特别不明智的事业。
这个剧本极其没有创意。

sentence.Network_en: He chose a singularly inappropriate moment to make his request.
sentence.Network_cn: 他选在一个极其不恰当的时刻提出要求。

entry.def: The singular form of a word is the form that is used when referring to one person or thing.

example.ex: ...the fifteen case endings of the singular form of the Finnish noun...
example.tran: 芬兰语的名词单数形式的 15 种格尾

example.ex: The word 'you' can be singular or plural.
example.tran: 单词 you 可以是单数也可以是复数。

entry.def: The singular of a noun is the form of it that is used to refer to one person or thing.

example.ex: The singular of Inuit is Inuk.
example.tran: Inuit (依努依特人)的单数形式是 Inuk。

entry.def: Singular means very great and remarkable.

example.ex: Barre was quickly drawn into the electoral arena, although with singular lack of success.
example.tran: 尽管胜算微乎其微，巴雷还是很快被身不由己地推到了选举的舞台上。

entry.def: If you describe someone or something as singular, you mean that they are strange or unusual.

example.ex: Cardinal Meschia was without doubt a singular character...
example.tran: 红衣主教梅斯基亚无疑是个怪人。

example.ex: Where he got that singular notion I just can't think.
example.tran: 我真想不出来他从哪来的那种奇怪念头。

means.word_mean: 1. in a singular manner or to a singular degree;

sentences.sentence: "Lord T. was considered singularly licentious even for the courts of Russia and Portugal; he acquired three wives and fourteen children during his Portuguese embassy alone"

auth_sentence.content: He was singularly focused on show business.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was singularly focused on show business.

auth_sentence.content: I was singularly fortunate to spend these summers of childhood among such people.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was singularly fortunate to spend these summers of childhood among such people.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was singularly fortunate to spend these summers of childhood among such people.

sentences.en: The statement of our delegation was singularly appropriate to the occasion.
sentences.cn: 我们代表团的声明非常适合时宜。

sentences.en: This treatment was singularly inappropriate in her case.
sentences.cn: 就她的情况来说这种治疗方法极不适合。

sentences.en: We did some singularly boring experiment.
sentences.cn: 我们做了一些非常乏味的试验。
